title: Top Floor Urban One-Bedroom with Vaulted Ceilings!
posting_body: In Maple Valley Is Now Open
☏ CONTACT US FOR YOUR MOVE IN!!
Address: 22632 SE 240th Street Maple Valley, WA 98038
Nestled among the evergreens, Marquee Living offers easy access to Hwy 18 and 167, plus just minutes from downtown Maple Valley.
Scenic hiking trails are just blocks away that lead to beautiful Lake Wilderness.
You are also within walking distance of your favorite coffee shops, restaurants, and shopping centers.
Marquee Living is a unique boutique apartment community made for Maple Valley and You!!
Make friends with your neighbors and the whole neighborhood.
This is urban living at its best.
We offer modern custom apartment homes with many amenities.
All of our urbans, one-, and two-bedroom homes feature full size washers and dryers, high-efficiency stainless steel appliance package and matte black interior finishes.
Most of our apartments have charming balconies and some even have their own generous wrap-a-round patios that overlook the valley.
Our pet-friendly apartments also offer granite countertops, premium wood floors, oversized custom framed windows and outdoor storage closets  .
•	Designer Kitchens with Matte Black Custom Cabinets
•	Stainless Steel Appliance Package (refrigerator, stove, dishwasher & microwave)
•	Sliding Barn Doors in Select Homes
Marquee Living is a pet friendly community.
We accept cats and dogs under 55lbs.
Please contact for information on pet restrictions, deposit, and fees.
Household must make 2.5 times the market rent to qualify.
We would love to give you a tour!
Contact us to schedule a viewing:
Prices and availability subject to change daily
*Photos shown my not be of exact apartments available.
We often use photos from one apartment to represent all apartments of that floorplan.
Come today and see for yourself!
Marquee Living was made for Maple Valley…
